name: CR BOM Masters
query:
SELECT
`tabBOM`.name as "ID:Link/BOM:200",
`tabItem`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:250",
`tabItem`.rollon_code as "ROLLON Code:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group:Data:130"

FROM
`tabBOM`,
`tabItem`

WHERE
`tabBOM`.item_name=`tabItem`.item_name
ORDER BY `tabItem`.rollon_code ASC, `tabItem`.name ASC
